Title: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of mental health to conduct a study on the suicide rates of taxi medallion holders and taxi drivers in the state
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of mental health to conduct a study on the suicide rates of taxi medallion holders and taxi drivers in the state and make a report and recommendations on the findings of such study within one year.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing and directing the commissioner of mental health to conduct a study on the suicide rates of taxi medallion holders and taxi drivers in the state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
